title: EM waves - claim about higher frequency category

content.prompt: Which of the following claims about the frequencies of different categories of electromagnetic waves is correct?

choices.label: X-rays have a higher frequency than gamma rays.
Radio waves have a higher frequency than microwaves.
Infrared light has a higher frequency than red light.
Ultraviolet light has a higher frequency than violet light.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
